 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָוָה‎</span>]<sub>485</sub> **verb Pi\`el** ==lay charge== (upon), ==give charge== (to), ==charge, command, order== ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xii (1887), 641</sup> [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>124 op.</sup> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***combine***, II. ***enjoin***, IV. ***charge***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***injunction, command***; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***heap up*** (stones), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***stone-heap***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***guide-stone***, compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>57</sup>; [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]] makes Hebrew verbdenominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְוָה‎</span> but verb is much earlier); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוָּה‎</span> [[Gen.6.22|Gen 6:22]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוַּנִי‎</span> [[Deut.4.5|Deut 4:5]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוְּךָ‎</span> [[Deut.4.23|Deut 4:23]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוָּהוּ‎</span> [[Gen.7.5|Gen 7:5]] +, etc.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוִּיתִי‎</span> [[Exod.29.35|Exod 29:35]] + 29 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִוֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Lev.8.31|Lev 8:31]] + 4 t., etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְצַוֶּה‎</span> [[Gen.18.19|Gen 18:19]] + 8 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְצַו‎</span> [[Deut.28.8|Deut 28:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְצַו‎</span> [[Gen.2.16|Gen 2:16]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיצַוְּךָ‎</span> [[1Chr.22.12|1Chr 22:12]], etc.; 1s. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֲצִוֶּה‎</span> [[Ezra.8.17|Ezra 8:17]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ואוצאה‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְצַזּוּ‎</span> [[Gen.50.16|Gen 50:16]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַוֹּת‎</span> [[2Sam.18.5|2Sam 18:5]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַוֵּה‎</span> [[Josh.4.16|Josh 4:16]] + 2t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַו‎</span> [[Lev.6.2|Lev 6:2]] + 9 t.; masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַוּוּ‎</span> [[Josh.1.11|Josh 1:11]]; [[Josh.4.3|Josh 4:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַוֶּה‎</span> [[Num.32.23|Num 32:23]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַוֵּה‎</span> [[Isa.55.4|Isa 55:4]], etc.; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַוָּה‎</span> [[Gen.27.8|Gen 27:8]] — 

**1. a.** ***lay charge upon***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person, [[Gen.2.16|Gen 2:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Gen.28.6|Gen 28:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[1Kgs.2.43|1Kgs 2:43]]; [[1Kgs.11.11|1Kgs 11:11]]; [[Amos.2.12|Amos 2:12]]; [[Jer.35.6|Jer 35:6]] + 6t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל הֶעָבִים אֲצַוֶּה מֵהַמְטִיר‎</span> [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]], compare [[Job.36.32|Job 36:32]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלתָֿגָב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[2Chr.7.13|2Chr 7:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***give charge to, command to*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[Exod.1.22|Exod 1:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[1Sam.20.29|1Sam 20:29]]; [[1Chr.22.17|1Chr 22:17]]; [[Isa.13.3|Isa 13:3]]; [[Jer.32.23|Jer 32:23]]; [[Ps.105.8|Ps 105:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּ משֶׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָה צ‎</span> [[Deut.33.4|Deut 33:4]], compare [[Neh.9.14|Neh 9:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַו לְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[2Kgs.20.1|2Kgs 20:1]] ***give charge to thy household*** (in preparation for death) = [[Isa.38.1|Isa 38:1]] (compare Late Hebrew, B.Bath.<sup>151 b</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַוָּאָה‎</span> ***'verbal will'*** Id<sup>147 a</sup>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***give charge uno***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [[Exod.16.34|Exod 16:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Kgs.11.10|1Kgs 11:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְצַו אֶלכֵּֿיתוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.17.23|2Sam 17:23]] (compare 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.**). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***give charge over, appoint***, with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing, [[Neh.7.2|Neh 7:2]]; [[1Chr.22.12|1Chr 22:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לִהְיוֺת) נָנִיד עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> ***appoint*** one (to be) ruler over [[2Sam.6.21|2Sam 6:21]]; [[1Kgs.1.35|1Kgs 1:35]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לנגיד‎</span> [[1Sam.13.14|1Sam 13:14]]; [[1Sam.25.30|1Sam 25:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁפטים על‎</span> [[2Sam.7.11|2Sam 7:11]] = [[1Chr.17.10|1Chr 17:10]] with infinitive (no <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְעוֺת עמי‎</span> [[2Sam.7.7|2Sam 7:7]] = [[1Chr.17.6|1Chr 17:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצִוִּיתָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹתוֺ לְעֵינֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Num.27.19|Num 27:19]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***and thou shalt install him in their sight***, compare v[[Num.27.23|Num 27:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***give*** one ***charge, command*** (often <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***concerning***), [[Gen.12.20|Gen 12:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.8.22|Num 8:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Sam.14.8|2Sam 14:8]]; [[2Sam.18.5|2Sam 18:5]]; [[Jer.7.22|Jer 7:22]]; [[Jer.39.11|Jer 39:11]]; [[Isa.45.12|Isa 45:12]] ([[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Ry|Ry]]<sup>Kau</sup>; &gt; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and others as d), [[Isa.10.6|Isa 10:6]] (al. ***against***), [[Nah.1.14|Nah 1:14]] (al. ***id.***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Num.9.8|Num 9:8]]; [[Num.32.38|Num 32:38]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ps.91.11|Ps 91:11]]; [[Lam.1.17|Lam 1:17]]; [[Esth.3.2|Esth 3:2]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Isa.23.11|Isa 23:11]]; [[Jer.47.7|Jer 47:7]]. 

**2.** ***charge, command:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative of person + thing, often, especially of the law: Deuteronomic phrases are <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר אנכי מצוךָ‎</span> [[Exod.34.11|Exod 34:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.4.40|Deut 4:40]]; [[Deut.6.2|Deut 6:2]]; [[Deut.6.6|Deut 6:6]] + 18 t. Deuteronomy, compare [[Deut.15.15|Deut 15:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנכי מצוה אתכם‎</span> [[Deut.4.2|Deut 4:2]] (twice in verse) + 9 t. Deuteronomy; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַדֶּרֶךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Deut.13.6|Deut 13:6]]; [[Deut.13.6|Deut 13:6]]; [[Exod.32.8|Exod 32:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.5.30|Deut 5:30]]; [[Deut.9.12|Deut 9:12]]; [[Deut.9.16|Deut 9:16]]; [[Deut.11.28|Deut 11:28]]; [[Deut.31.29|Deut 31:29]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with accusative of person + object clause, e.g., Infinitive [[Gen.50.2|Gen 50:2]]+; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> consecutive Perfect [[Gen.18.19|Gen 18:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.35.2|Num 35:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> consecutive Imperfect [[2Sam.4.12|2Sam 4:12]]; [[1Kgs.2.46|1Kgs 2:46]] weak <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> with Imperfect [[Exod.27.20|Exod 27:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Josh.4.16|Josh 4:16]] Imperative [[Josh.1.9|Josh 1:9]]; [[1Sam.18.22|1Sam 18:22]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** accusative of person, accusative of thing omitted, [[Exod.18.23|Exod 18:23]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Gen.49.33|Gen 49:33]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) +; object given after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאמֹר‎</span> [[Gen.26.11|Gen 26:11]]; [[Gen.32.15|Gen 32:15]]; [[Gen.32.20|Gen 32:20]]; [[Lev.6.2|Lev 6:2]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּאֹמֶר‎</span> etc., [[Gen.28.1|Gen 28:1]]; [[Gen.49.29|Gen 49:29]] +. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** accusative of thing, accusative of person omitted, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לעולם בריתוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Ps.111.9|Ps 111:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶה הַדָּבָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר צ‎</span>, [[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]]; [[Exod.16.32|Exod 16:32]]; [[Exod.35.4|Exod 35:4]]; [[Lev.8.5|Lev 8:5]]; [[Lev.9.6|Lev 9:6]]; [[Lev.17.2|Lev 17:2]]; [[Num.30.2|Num 30:2]]; [[Num.36.6|Num 36:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); object clause, [[Lev.8.34|Lev 8:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Lev.13.54|Lev 13:54]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); [[Gen.42.25|Gen 42:25]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.5.20|1Kgs 5:20]]; [[Judg.4.6|Judg 4:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** absolute [[Gen.50.16|Gen 50:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Lam.3.37|Lam 3:37]]. 

**3.** ***charge, command***, accusative of person in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּאֲשֶׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.23.15|Exod 23:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Gen.7.9|Gen 7:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ככל אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Gen.7.5|Gen 7:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.29.35|Exod 29:35]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משֶׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כאשׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.12.28|Exod 12:28]]; [[Exod.12.50|Exod 12:50]]; [[Exod.39.1|Exod 39:1]]; [[Exod.39.5|Exod 39:5]] + 37 t. [[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ככל אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.39.32|Exod 39:32]]; [[Exod.39.42|Exod 39:42]] + 5t. [[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לכל אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Josh.1.18|Josh 1:18]]; [[Josh.22.2|Josh 22:2]]; [[Jer.35.8|Jer 35:8]] accusative of person omitted <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כאשׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.7.10|Exod 7:10]]; [[Num.32.25|Num 32:25]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ככל אשׁר צ‎</span> [[2Kgs.11.9|2Kgs 11:9]] = [[2Chr.23.8|2Chr 23:8]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לכל אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.36.1|Exod 36:1]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**4.** ***charge***, with command to others, ***commission***, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** accusative of person +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person (sometimes + accusative of thing) [[Exod.6.13|Exod 6:13]]; [[Exod.25.22|Exod 25:22]]; [[Lev.27.34|Lev 27:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Deut.1.3|Deut 1:3]]; [[Jer.27.4|Jer 27:4]]; [[Esth.4.10|Esth 4:10]] accusative of person omitted [[Gen.50.16|Gen 50:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]]; [[Esth.8.9|Esth 8:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיַד‎</span> of agent, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, [[Num.15.23|Num 15:23]]; [[Num.36.13|Num 36:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> omitted [[Lev.8.36|Lev 8:36]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezra.9.11|Ezra 9:11]]; [[Neh.8.14|Neh 8:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Ezra.8.17|Ezra 8:17]]; [[1Chr.22.13|1Chr 22:13]]; [[Mal.3.22|Mal 3:22]]; [[Esth.4.5|Esth 4:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** with accusative of thing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּרְכָתִי לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וצ‎</span> [[Lev.25.21|Lev 25:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***and I will command my blessing to you***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִתְּךָ‎</span> [[Deut.28.8|Deut 28:8]], compare [[Ps.133.3|Ps 133:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חסדוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Ps.42.9|Ps 42:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּקֶר‎</span> [[Job.38.12|Job 38:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחָשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span> [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]]; [[Amos.9.4|Amos 9:4]]. 

**5.** ***command, appoint, ordain***, of divine act: in creation [[Isa.45.12|Isa 45:12]]; [[Ps.33.9|Ps 33:9]]; [[Ps.148.5|Ps 148:5]], providence [[2Sam.17.4|2Sam 17:4]]; [[Amos.6.11|Amos 6:11]]; [[Amos.9.9|Amos 9:9]]; [[Job.37.12|Job 37:12]]; [[Ps.78.23|Ps 78:23]]; [[Isa.34.16|Isa 34:16]], redemption [[Ps.7.7|Ps 7:7]]; [[Ps.44.5|Ps 44:5]]; [[Ps.68.29|Ps 68:29]]; [[Ps.71.3|Ps 71:3]] so of idol [[Isa.48.5|Isa 48:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׂה‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֻוָּה‎</span> [[Num.3.16|Num 3:16]]; [[Num.36.2|Num 36:2]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֻוֵּיתָה‎</span> [[Gen.45.19|Gen 45:19]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְצֻוֶּה‎</span> [[Exod.34.34|Exod 34:34]] — ***be commanded***, i.e. receive command, subject person, [[Gen.45.19|Gen 45:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> by whom [[Num.36.2|Num 36:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר צ‎</span> [[Exod.34.34|Exod 34:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּיכֵֿן צ‎</span> [[Lev.8.35|Lev 8:35]]; [[Lev.10.13|Lev 10:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כאשׁר צ‎</span> [[Num.3.16|Num 3:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Ezek.12.7|Ezek 12:7]]; [[Ezek.24.18|Ezek 24:18]]; [[Ezek.37.7|Ezek 37:7]].
